Html:
Iám getting the error below...?

[Wed Feb 23 16:46:18 2011] [error] [client IP-Adres] PHP Fatal error:  Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Could not close zip file /var/www/html/Tests/05featuredemo.xlsx.' in /var/www/html/Classes/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel2007.php:344\nStack trace:\n#0 /var/www/html/Tests/05featuredemo.php(42): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007->save('/var/www/html/T...')\n#1 {main}\n  thrown in /var/www/html/Classes/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel2007.php on line 344, referer: http://IP-Adres/Tests/

Generally this means one of 3 things:

  1. The directory where you're trying to save the file doesn't exist
  2. The directory/file has permissions that preclude you from writing to it
  3. The file is already open in some other application, or has a lock on it
It was the write rights of the directory that where wrong. thanks for the reply

For anyone looking for this error who isn't helped by the above suggestions, check one more thing:

'4. The drive where you're trying to save the file is full.'

That would have saved me a headache of a morning :)
